name: Glube the Destroyer
description:
Years ago, a gelatinous green alien creature known as Glube the Destroyer attacked the peaceful planet of Amal. While the people were able to fend them off, Glube has returned. It's up to you to fly your ship in this Star Fox-like space shooter game and defeat Glube before it destroys the city!

the build is mostly finished. there might be more update before the jam submission period ends.
the Glube jam (https://itch.io/jam/glube-jam) submission period ends April 12th, 12:59 AM Eastern)
